title: How to Send a Secret Message Through a Picture

steps.headline: Create a folder in your desktop.
steps.description:
Here that folder name is Secret. This step is optional but helpful to keep all your files in order. Put the all files you use throughout the process in here. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e8\/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e8\/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":305,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":503.5,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Create a .bmp picture file.
steps.description: To do so, follow these steps. If you already have one, you can skip ahead. Open any picture type with any image editor. Click on File > Save as. Write the file name and choose 24-bit Bitmap (*.bmp,*.dib) or any .bmp type from the "Save as type drop down list. Click on Save and exit from the image editor. If you don't have any picture file, then open an image editor. Draw any picture and save it in .bmp format.

steps.headline: Open  Notepad or any text editor.
steps.description:
You can open Notepad by clicking on Start > Run. Then type notepad and hit ↵ Enter. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e3\/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e3\/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Write a name for this file and save it in .txt format.
Open Command Prompt by clicking on Start > Run and typing cmd.
steps.description:
Then hit ↵ Enter. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/f4\/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/f4\/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Type below code in Command Prompt and hit ↵ Enter.
steps.description:
copy "<PICTURE FILE PATH>" + "<TEXT FILE PATH>" "<NEW PICTURE PATH>"

Example:copy "C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\Secret\pic.bmp" + "C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\Secret\note.txt" "C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\Secret\secret.bmp"

steps.headline: Check back at your folder.
steps.description:
You'll find a new .bmp file named secret.bmp, which is your final image file, which contains your secret message. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/28\/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-10.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/28\/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-10.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Open that final image file secret.bmp in Notepad or any text editor.
Scroll down to the end and you'll see that secret message.

text:
Preparing the Picture Create a folder in your desktop. Here that folder name is Secret. This step is optional but helpful to keep all your files in order. Put the all files you use throughout the process in here. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e8/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e8/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":305,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":503.5,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Create a .bmp picture file. To do so, follow these steps. If you already have one, you can skip ahead. Open any picture type with any image editor. Click on File > Save as. Write the file name and choose 24-bit Bitmap (*.bmp,*.dib) or any .bmp type from the "Save as type drop down list. Click on Save and exit from the image editor. If you don't have any picture file, then open an image editor. Draw any picture and save it in .bmp format. Preparing the Message Open Notepad or any text editor. You can open Notepad by clicking on Start > Run. Then type notepad and hit ↵ Enter. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e3/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e3/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Write your secret message. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6e/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-5.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6e/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-5.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Click on File > Save as. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a0/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a0/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Write a name for this file and save it in .txt format. Combining the Picture and Message Open Command Prompt by clicking on Start > Run and typing cmd. Then hit ↵ Enter. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/f/f4/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/f/f4/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Type below code in Command Prompt and hit ↵ Enter. copy "" + "" "" Example:copy "C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\Secret\pic.bmp" + "C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\Secret ote.txt" "C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\Secret\secret.bmp" Check back at your folder. You'll find a new .bmp file named secret.bmp, which is your final image file, which contains your secret message. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/2/28/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-10.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/2/28/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-10.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Decoding Open that final image file secret.bmp in Notepad or any text editor. Scroll down to the end and you'll see that secret message. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/55/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-12.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/55/Send-a-Secret-Message-Through-a-Picture-Step-12.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}
